title: DELL XPS 13 Plus (9320) 13.4" OLED Touch i7-1360P 16GB DDR5 1TB WIN11PRO
description:
Лаптоп
Дисплей:13.4" (34cm)
Резолуција: (3456x2160) 3.5K, 60Hz, OLED, Touch, Anti-Reflect, 400 nit, InfinityEdge
Процесор:13th Gen Intel® Core™ i7-1360P (18 MB cache, 12 cores, up to 5.00 GHz Turbo)
Графика:Intel® Iris® Xe Graphics
RAM меморија: 16 GB: LPDDR5, 6000 MT/s (onboard), dual-channel
Диск (Storage): 1 TB, M.2, PCIe NVMe, SSD
Wi-Fi 6E 1675 (AX211), 2x2, 802.11ax, Bluetooth® wireless card
Камера:720p at 30 fps HD RGB camera, 400p at 30 fps IR camera, dual-array microphones
Backlit English Keyboard with Fingerprint Reader
Оперативен систем:Windows 11 Pro
Порти:
2 x Thunderbolt™ 4 (USB Type-C™ with DisplayPort and Power Delivery)
USB-C to USB-A 3.0 adapter (included in the box)
USB-C to 3.5mm headset adapter (included in the box)
Батерија: 3 Cell, 55 Wh, integrated
Полнач: 60 Watt AC Adapter USB-C
